text: Soukohp Jeremiah guu dili dana daahili manawa gee ang gi King Josiah. Di maa guu hai di mee haihai i lodo Israel ang gi nia daane mo nia ahina huwa daahili, gu huwahuwa taahili deenei i di nadau madagoaa e tangitangi lodo huaidu ang gi mee. Taahili deenei la guu hihi i lodo di Beebaa Daahili Manawa gee.
